name: Zomzoms
description:
Zomzoms is an arcade/NES style game following the story of a female freelance construction worker named Diamond "Dia" Foster, and her magic hammer Hammy, as they repair a rogue A.I. named Lexi. The game involves players collecting three parts across three levels with unique obstacles, as well as a final boss fight. This game has a simple, lighthearted story featuring an adventure about repairing damage. Its main loop involves navigation of the level in different ways and use of Hammy to remove obstacles and repair Lexi.

Zomzoms was created for Global Game Jam 2020 by Holden Hall, Alex Garbus, Jake Jackman, and John Meador.
